title: Really nice, go if you have the time
text: Incredible scenery, really nice if you re into temples and stuff like that. The walk to the top ( where you will find a stadium ) is a bit hard i guess ( for some ?! ) but totally worth it

title: Nice site, very hoot
text:
Nice site to visit. Very hot even though I was there first thing in the morning
Overpriced but understandable because they need the money to renovate
